title: The Spiritual Impact of Hare Krishna Mantra | @madhupanditdasaofficial  | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.key_quote: So we have to make people chant so that we manifest the Lord in our dimension.
segments.summary: Chanting the Hare Krishna mantra manifests the Lord and benefits not only the individual but also the surrounding community, especially in Kali Yuga.
